content:
I am trying but failing on the right syntaxis in shorthand in order to fill in * text.div. I don't want to use the narrative created by the IG Publisher.
Is there an example I can follow?
Thanks!

Here is an example of how to set the text.div: 

Instance: P
InstanceOf: Patient
* text.div = """<div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
This is a simple example with only plain text
</div>
"""
* text.status = #additional
* name.family = "foo"

and a here is the link in FSH Online. The important note is that the content of the text.div must be valid xhtml.
Diana_Ovelgoenne has marked this topic as resolved.
The first time I did something like this, it tripped me up that I needed to include the <div> tags rather than it being added automatically.
